nodes.text: Carrier was a position in the sport of speedball. Massie Herhis was a known carrier.

The position was mentioned in a two-page segment titled "Sightings by Twang", written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
